resources.string:
Hi My Name is Corey. 

 I like playing football and basketball. 

 My girlfriend's name is Olivia. Her momma name is Kelly and her daddy name Keith. 

 For my birthday I want eat bukoo food from different asian cultures, like ramen, sushi, fried rice, mongolian beef, shit like that. 

 You know I grew up in the 9th w/d, with my grandma nem. I miss her, my momma, and aunt Gail. 

 This aunt Gail shit really hurt. 

 Can't forget my lil kashew Elan. His momma Olivia still hurting behind that, 
 I'll pray for her
